channel.title: Graalvm on Random Bits of Wisdom
channel.description: Recent content in Graalvm on Random Bits of Wisdom

item.description: My first attempt to try out compiling a Micronaut app to a native GraalVM image ended up with a disastrous “Out of Memory”. After more than ten minutes of a spinning fan (on a 4-core machine with 16GB RAM) that’s what I got: I am fully aware that the hoops that the GraalVM compile has to go through are simply phenomenal, and I have heard many good words about the level of performance that apps are able to reach this way.
